dek: The many ways to misspell the hardest names in pop culture. Think you can do better?

prelude.value: Without autocorrect we’d be a hot mess. Colin Morris recently explored the difficulties of spelling through flow diagrams of potential self-identified errors in Reddit comments. It’s no surprise that Jake and Maggie Gyllenhaal, along with other celebrities, were atop the list. We wanted to take this idea a step further and make a fun experiment out of it.

tutorial.value: Let’s look at over half a million attempts of people trying to search for “Britney Spears.” Here are the 10 most common permutations of just her first name, <button class=btn--britney>Britney</button>. You can see that the first three letters “BRI” were a lock before paths started to deviate.

quiz.value: Below we’ll put you through a series of tests. Do as many as you’d like. If you just want to see the results, you can skip ahead.
